verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: threatened] [ARG1: an all - out trade war with China] [ARGM-MNR: by announcing the possibility of tariffs on an additional $ 200 billion worth of Chinese goods] . The S&P 500 is set to open lower by about 1 % .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] threatened an all - out trade war with China by [V: announcing] [ARG1: the possibility of tariffs on an additional $ 200 billion worth of Chinese goods] . The S&P 500 is set to open lower by about 1 % .

President Donald Trump threatened an all - out trade war with China by announcing the possibility of tariffs on an additional $ 200 billion worth of Chinese goods . The S&P 500 [V: is] set to open lower by about 1 % .

President Donald Trump threatened an all - out trade war with China by announcing the possibility of tariffs on an additional $ 200 billion worth of Chinese goods . [ARG1: The S&P 500] is [V: set] [ARG2: to open lower by about 1 %] .

President Donald Trump threatened an all - out trade war with China by announcing the possibility of tariffs on an additional $ 200 billion worth of Chinese goods . [ARG1: The S&P 500] is set to [V: open] [ARGM-MNR: lower] [ARGM-EXT: by about 1 %] .
